---
title: "Chisq-Results-Processor"
format: html
---

I will begin by loading three things.  

1. the data that were stored from creating the batch file.

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(jsonlite)
library(tidyverse)
load("rchisq-8.RData")
```

2. The queries

```{r}
Chisq8Call <- stream_in(file("rchisq-8-Call-Revised-0806.jsonl"))
```

3. The Results

```{r}
Chisq8Result <- stream_in(file("rchisq-8-0806_output.jsonl"))
```

## Merge the call and the result

```{r}
Chisq.8.OpenAI <- left_join(Chisq8Call,Chisq8Result)
Full.Chisq.8 <- left_join(Chisq8$params, Chisq.8.OpenAI)
```

The file is saved as `Full.Chisq.8.RData`.

Put the result in the params file.

```{r}
Full.Chisq.8$Outcome <- map_chr(Chisq8$params$iter, function(x) { unlist(Chisq8Result$response$body$choices[[x]][[2]][2]) })
table(Full.Chisq.8$Outcome)
```

```{r}
save(Full.Chisq.8, file="Full.Chisq.8.0806.RData")
```
